message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly below my minimum.  To make this work, I could accept $13,500.  This feels like a fair compromise.

Thank you for your response, Alice. While I appreciate the flexibility shown in your offer, I am still unable to meet at $13,500. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13,000. I hope this proposal will be more suitable for both of us.
